channel.title: Server problem
channel.description:
My server was fine yesterday, 30+ people on. I ran the server today, and no one can login. I use uTorrent instead of port forwarding. And my uTorrent seems to not be working i guess. Everyone can login using my hamachi ip. But everyone could login yesterday non-hamachi.
--http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=235 (uTorrent tut)

item.title: Server problem
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

  1. Run no-ip
  2. Turn on what adresss you want.
  3. run your server
  4. Turn on utorrent

you should be good now

Read full topic
